sourceMeaningMnemonic: When your <radical>sick</radical> <radical>mama</radical> tries to do a <radical>task</radical> she's filled with <kanji>pain</kanji>!
meaningInfo: Sick people shouldn't have to do things, of course they're in pain. You shouldn't let your mama do anything if she's in pain, do it for her!
readingMnemonic: Your mama's <kanji>pain</kanji> is <reading>too</reading> (<ja>つう</ja>) much for her to handle, so now you have to do all of her tasks too.
readingInfo: You finish doing your tasks and hers too, and you ask her, "How is the pain now, Mama?" "THE PAIN IS TOO MUCH!" she cries. Oh mama.
